instructions.line: Mine 15 Gold Ores and smith them into Gold Bars

task.desc: Obtain 15 Gourm' impling jar through Hunter
Pickup 20 Morrigan's throwing axe from monster drops
Obtain 1 Mithril full helm through Smithing
Obtain 1 Mithril platelegs or Mithril plateskirt through Smithing
Bury 25 Dragon Bones inside of a dungeon
Pickup 10 Soul talisman from monster drops

achievement.title: This is what I trained for

task.desc: Obtain 100 Kingly impling jar through Hunter
Pickup 1 Adamant c'bow (u) from monster drops
Obtain 3,000 Pack yak pouch through Summoning

Kill 5,000 General Graardor or K'ril Tsutsaroth or Avatar of Destruction or Chaos Elemental or Corporeal Beast or Bork or TzTok-Jad or King Black Dragon or Giant Mole or Night-gazer Khighorahk or Bal'lak the Pummeller or Unholy Cursebearer or Bulwark Beast
Complete 250 LARGE dungeons on HARD difficulty
Obtain 250 Kingly impling jar through Hunter
Obtain a total bounty of 1,000,000 for killing players

constraint.desc: Wearing Arrows: Dragon bolts (e) or Bone bolts or Onyx bolts
Wearing Weapon: Rune c'bow or Chaotic c'bow or Zanik's c'bow

task.desc: Place a single bounty of 1,337 PKP
Obtain a total bounty of 1,000 for killing players
Kill 50 Ice Strykewyrm in the wilderness
Complete 1 LARGE dungeons on HARD difficulty
Pickup 12500 PvM Token from monster drops
